posts.title: 16th Anniversary of National Bolivarian Police
posts.summary: SAIME provided identification services at the police anniversary event in La Guaira, processing renewals and data verification for officers.

posts.title: Digital Migration Validation Service Launched
posts.summary: Online platform for correcting migration status issues - allows users to manage correction from home without intermediaries.

posts.title: Caracas Smiles Community Event
posts.summary: Over 100 citizens in La Vega neighborhood received identity documents through community outreach program.

posts.title: ExpoTransporte 2025 Success
posts.summary: More than 1,000 citizens renewed identification documents at the transport expo at La Carlota air base.

posts.title: Digital Migration Movement Certificates
posts.summary: New feature enables citizens to request documents, confirm data and proceed with online payment for travel records.

posts.title: School Identification Campaign
posts.summary: Over 200 students and staff received first-time IDs or renewals at Liceo Fermín Toro.

posts.title: National ID Renewal Drive Results
posts.summary: Four-day campaign processed 34,716 identity renewals across all national offices.

service_pages.summary: Over 300 workers received ID services at Ministry of Higher Education Nov 13-14, 2025
Mobile ID routes for fishing communities across four states starting Nov 10, 2025
180+ indigenous community members received provisional passports for COP30
Two new offices opened Nov 10, 2025 in Plaza Las Americas and Boleita
Modernized web portal launched Nov 4, 2025 with online passport/ID processing
